name: Aquatic Drone Wars
description:
SCOPE having only a short time to create this ,i decided to start with a premade game about tanks etc, changing the code as needed, and rip out  the working code so it would not need testing, and had simple graphics so no copywrite issues , I have poor eyesight so cant check everything in a short time but will get there in the end,.

The game is an underwater submarine and drone game, heavily reliant on oxygen . a nuclear war above water has poisoned the oxygen, now bases under the oceans make it. your shuttle subs are your supply artery and ship supplies to bases, and bases supply subs, there are attack subs, and drone subs, the drone subs attack with lots of drones, you also have sub bases that have drones that assist in attacks.

there is a live SONAR database to find prime targets, or subs low on air that need to TAKE A BREATH, very important tool

it will run on windows PCs 64bit
